page.title: 18MADGINFORD ESTATE'S SHOPPING
page.content: An arcade of shops next to Madginford Park Junior School consists of: {Hairdresser's (6 employed), Video (2), {I'national Stores (49,many part-time), {Greengrocer's (4), Do-it-yourself (2), {Newsbox(4),Butcher's(2),Sports shop(2) {"Best of Bread"(3),Pat's Drapers(3). Percentage replies by 56 shoppers to questions one Thursday afternoon were: -What other shop would you like? { Chemist-56, Post Office or Bank-25, { Clothes-8, Others-11. } -How have you travelled to the shops? { Foot-35, Bicycle-3, Car-62.} -Is car parking adequate?{Yes-61 No-39 -Are you from the estate?{Yes-36 No-64 -How often do you shop in Maidstone? { Weekly-54, Occasionally-44, Never-2. -Do you go further to shop (e.g.London or Ashford)?{Yes-23, No-77. -Would you like Sunday opening? { Yes-29, No-71.
